comments:
I20061114-0927

Steps to reproduce:
(1) Turn on the option to "remove terminated launches when a new launch is created" (Preferences > Run/Debug > Launching)
(2) From the debug perspective, launch an Eclipse Application (workbench) in debug mode
(3) After it starts, close the newly launched Eclipse Application
(4) Change to the Java perspective
(5) Re-launch the Eclipse Application (press the debug button)
